titles.title: Homeless Youth Menstrual Product Access Act of 2021
To amend the Runaway and Homeless Youth Act to permit services provided by grant recipients to include provision of sanitary napkins and tampons.
Homeless Youth Menstrual Product Access Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: Homeless Youth Menstrual Product Access Act of 2021 This bill expands the permissible uses of federal grants by local centers serving runaway and homeless youth to include the provision of menstrual hygiene products.
